[Acquiring Clan Reputation]
1. New clan members who graduate an Academy through Awakening can acquire Clan Reputation ranging from 220 to 1,000 points.
2. Capturing a castle through a siege wins you 1,500 points from the loser's Clan Reputation. (1,500 points are won even if the defenders are NPCs.)
3. If a clan continues to possess a castle they had captured for 2 more weeks, they gain another 750 points.
4. Newly acquiring a Contestable Clan Hall gives you 500 points; if the clan hall was won from another clan, 500 points are taken from their Reputation Points.
5. If a clan continues to possess a clan hall they had captured for 2 more weeks, they gain another 250 points.
6. If a clan has members that become Heroes, up to 1,000 points are given to the clan, depending on the number of Hero members.
7. Reputation can also be increased through special clan quests.
8. If your clan defeats an enemy clan member during a clan war (mutually declared) or a castle siege, 1 point is taken per slain enemy clan member.
* You cannot steal the other clan's reputation if the other clan is below Lv. 5 or its reputation is less than 0.
(Not applicable to Academy members.)
9. For capturing a fortress during a siege, you gain 200 points. A clan Lv. 5 or above gains 6 - 745 Reputation Points every time a clan member Lv. 40 or above levels up.
10. Demolishing a ballista in a fortress earns your clan 30 points. Clans can also earn reputation through clan-exclusive pets (Raccoon/ White Cat/ Desert Fox: 500 points; Bratty Angma: 100 points)
11. Each character on a battleground for a castle siege will gain 1 Clan Reputation along with Individual Fame.

[Losing Clan Reputation]
1. If you fail to defend a castle in a siege, your clan loses up to 3,000 points.
2. If you lose a Contestable Clan Hall to another clan, your clan loses up to 1,000 points.
3. If an allied clan member is killed by an enemy clan member during a clan war (mutually declared) or a castle siege, 1 point is lost per clan member.
(Not applicable to Academy members.)
4. Reputation Points can be used to purchase items that help raise the clan's level, or to acquire Clan Skills.
*Reputation is not lost if the clan is below Lv. 5 or its reputation is less than 0.
